solution_line_template: Grace can read {total_pages_initial_book}/{time_to_read_initial_book} = <<{total_pages_initial_book}/{time_to_read_initial_book}={pages_per_hour}>>{pages_per_hour} pages in 1 hour.
So she can finish a {pages_new_book}/{pages_per_hour} = <<{pages_new_book}/{pages_per_hour}={time_to_read_new_book}>>{time_to_read_new_book} hours.
